property.name: timeline.metrics.service.operation.mode
property.description: Service Operation modes: 1) embedded: Metrics stored on local FS, HBase in Standalone mode 2) distributed: HBase daemons writing to HDFS

property.name: timeline.metrics.service.webapp.address
property.description: The address of the metrics service web application.

property.name: timeline.metrics.service.rpc.address
property.description: The address of the metrics service rpc listeners.

property.name: timeline.metrics.aggregator.checkpoint.dir
property.description: Directory to store aggregator checkpoints. Change to a permanent location so that checkpoint ar not lost.

property.name: timeline.metrics.host.aggregator.minute.interval
property.description: Time in seconds to sleep for the minute resolution host based aggregator. Default resolution is 5 minutes.

property.name: timeline.metrics.host.aggregator.hourly.interval
property.description: Time in seconds to sleep for the hourly resolution host based aggregator. Default resolution is 1 hour.

property.name: timeline.metrics.daily.aggregator.minute.interval
property.description: Time in seconds to sleep for the day resolution host based aggregator. Default resolution is 24 hours.

property.name: timeline.metrics.cluster.aggregator.hourly.interval
property.description: Time in seconds to sleep for the hourly resolution cluster wide aggregator. Default is 1 hour.

property.name: timeline.metrics.cluster.aggregator.daily.interval
property.description: Time in seconds to sleep for the day resolution cluster wide aggregator. Default is 24 hours.

property.name: timeline.metrics.cluster.aggregator.minute.interval
property.description: Time in seconds to sleep for the minute resolution cluster wide aggregator. Default resolution is 5 minutes.

property.name: timeline.metrics.cluster.aggregator.second.interval
property.description: Time in seconds to sleep for the second resolution cluster wide aggregator. Default resolution is 2 minutes.

property.name: timeline.metrics.host.aggregator.daily.ttl
property.description: Host based daily resolution data purge interval in seconds. Default is 1 year.

property.name: timeline.metrics.host.aggregator.hourly.ttl
property.description: Host based hourly resolution data purge interval in seconds. Default is 30 days.

property.name: timeline.metrics.host.aggregator.minute.ttl
property.description: Host based minute resolution data purge interval in seconds. Default is 7 days.

property.name: timeline.metrics.cluster.aggregator.second.ttl
property.description: Cluster wide second resolution data purge interval in seconds. Default is 7 days.

property.name: timeline.metrics.cluster.aggregator.minute.ttl
property.description: Cluster wide minute resolution data purge interval in seconds. Default is 30 days.

property.name: timeline.metrics.cluster.aggregator.hourly.ttl
property.description: Cluster wide hourly resolution data purge interval in seconds. Default is 1 year.

property.name: timeline.metrics.cluster.aggregator.daily.ttl
property.description: Cluster wide daily resolution data purge interval in seconds. Default is 2 years.

property.name: timeline.metrics.host.aggregator.ttl
property.description: 1 minute resolution data purge interval in seconds. Default is 1 day for embedded mode and 3 days for Distributed mode.

property.name: timeline.metrics.hbase.data.block.encoding
property.description: Codecs are enabled on a table by setting the DATA_BLOCK_ENCODING property. Default encoding is FAST_DIFF. This can be changed only before creating tables.

property.name: timeline.metrics.hbase.compression.scheme
property.description: Compression codes need to be installed and available before setting the scheme. Default compression is SNAPPY. Disable by setting to None. This can be changed only before creating tables.

property.name: timeline.metrics.service.default.result.limit
property.description: Max result limit on number of rows returned. Calculated as follows: 22 aggregate metrics/min * 2 * 60 * 6 : Retrieve 10 SECOND data for 2 hours.

property.name: timeline.metrics.service.checkpointDelay
property.description: Time in seconds to sleep on the first run or when the checkpoint is too old.

property.name: timeline.metrics.service.resultset.fetchSize
property.description: JDBC resultset prefect size for aggregator queries.

property.name: phoenix.query.maxGlobalMemoryPercentage
property.description: Percentage of total heap memory (i.e. Runtime.getRuntime().maxMemory()) that all threads may use.

property.name: phoenix.spool.directory
property.description: Set directory for Phoenix spill files. If possible set this to a different mount point from the one for hbase.rootdir in embedded mode.

property.name: timeline.metrics.service.cluster.aggregator.appIds
property.description: List of application ids to use for aggregating host level metrics for an application. Example: bytes_read across Yarn Nodemanagers.

property.name: timeline.metrics.service.use.groupBy.aggregators
property.description: Use a groupBy aggregated query to perform host level aggregations vs in-memory aggregations.

property.name: timeline.metrics.host.aggregate.splitpoints
property.description: Pre-split regions using the split points corresponding to this property for the precision table that stores seconds aggregate data.

property.name: timeline.metrics.cluster.aggregate.splitpoints
property.description: Pre-split regions using the split points corresponding to this property for the aggregate table that stores seconds aggregate data across hosts.

property.name: timeline.metrics.sink.report.interval
property.description: Time in seconds to sleep before report metrics to collector. Default resolution is 1 minute.

property.name: timeline.metrics.sink.collection.period
property.description: The interval between two service metrics data exports.

property.name: timeline.metrics.service.watcher.disabled
property.description: Disable Timeline Metric Store watcher thread. Disabled by default in AMS distributed mode.

property.name: timeline.metrics.service.watcher.initial.delay
property.description: The time to delay first watcher check execution Default resolution is 10 minutes.

property.name: timeline.metrics.service.watcher.delay
property.description: The delay between the termination of one watcher check execution and the commencement of the next Default resolution is 30 seconds.

property.name: timeline.metrics.service.watcher.timeout
property.description: The maximum time to wait for a single watcher check execution Default resolution is 30 seconds.

property.name: timeline.metrics.hbase.fifo.compaction.enabled
property.description: Enable Compaction policy for lower for Precision and Minute aggregate tables.

property.name: timeline.metrics.service.http.policy
property.description: This configures the HTTP endpoint for Yarn Application History Server for Ambari Metrics System. The following values are supported: - HTTP_ONLY : Service is provided only on http - HTTPS_ONLY : Service is provided only on https

property.name: timeline.metrics.hbase.init.check.enabled
property.description: Enable Initialization check for HBase tables during Metrics service startup.

property.name: timeline.metrics.cluster.aggregator.interpolation.enabled
property.description: Enable Linear interpolation for missing slices of data, while aggregating.
